channel.title: Been here ages
channel.description:
using the ddsspeced client, how would i add vengeance to the emote tab???
please help!

item.title: Been here ages
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

all the breaks are there. i’ll put a couple of things in

         case 168:
            // yes emote
                c.setAnimation(0x357);
            break;
          case 169:
            // no emote
                c.setAnimation(856);
            break;

			case 162:
                    if (actionTimer == 0) { { 
                            actionTimer = 10;
                            stillgfx(401, absY, absX); 
                            for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {}
                            for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { 
                                strPot = true; 
                                strPotTimer = 90; 
                                cba = abc / 10; 
                                abc2 = cba * 2; 
                                if (abc2 <= 1) {  
                                    abc2 = 2; 
                                }
                                updateRequired = true; 
                                appearanceUpdateRequired = true; 
                                break; 
                            }
                            inCombat(); 
                            attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); 
                            setAnimation(2890);    
                            string4UpdateRequired = true; 
                            RemoveAllWindows();  
}
				break;			

			case 164:
				// bow emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35A);
				break;

			case 165:
				// angry emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35B);
				break;

			case 161:
				// cry emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35C);
				break;

			case 170:
				// laugh emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35D);
				break;

			case 171:
				// cheer emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35E);
				break;

Read full topic

item.title: Been here ages
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:1, topic:269859”][quote author=djspanke link=topic=356183.msg2724835#msg2724835 date=1238259316]
now i get this clickingMost.java:382: orphaned case case 164: ^ 1 error press any key to continue...

all i have changed is [code]
case 162:
if (actionTimer == 0) { {
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {}
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(2890);
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();

		}
			break;

[/code]
help?
[/quote]

You have two in the same switch statement. Remove one of them.[/quote]

I am pretty sure that would throw a ‘duplicate case label’ error, not an orphaned case.

You most likely forgot to add a break;

Read full topic
